description:
# Scheduled Report Generation

Enable administrators to configure scheduled reports that run automatically and are delivered via email or saved to designated locations. Reports include search analytics, compliance summaries, and audit trails.

## Rationale
Manual report generation is time-consuming and often forgotten. Scheduled reports ensure compliance documentation stays current. Addresses the 'limited reporting' pain point seen in Genesys (pain-gen-5) and need for compliance evidence. Reduces dependency on IT staff for routine reporting.

## User Stories
- As an IT manager, I want weekly usage reports so that I can track WhoDis adoption without manual effort
- As a compliance officer, I want monthly compliance summaries so that I can include them in audit packages

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Admin interface for creating/managing scheduled reports
- [ ] Schedule options: daily, weekly, monthly, custom cron expression
- [ ] Report types: Search Usage Analytics, Compliance Summary, Audit Log Export
- [ ] Delivery options: Email (with attachment) or save to configured location
- [ ] Report templates customizable (fields, filters, format)
- [ ] Report execution history with status and download links
- [ ] Failed report notifications to admin
